item.description: Let’s celebrate the full moon on Wednesday March 27th at 7:00.  Do you want to “howl at the moon” with dance or do you prefer something slower?  We’ll have it all. We’ll celebrate the chakras dancing to Van Morrison’s Moondance…warming up with Moonlight Sonata and moving slowly to Ella and Norah Jones.  Stepping it up to Bad Moon Rising and tipping our Frank Sinatra hats to Fly Me to the Moon.  Finishing up with a dance prayer to Moon River and Enya’s Shephard Moon. Cost is $10 per person

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Moondance Yoga
